hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "Do not enter the ruined dwellings of those who were unjust to themselves unless (you enter) weeping, lest you should suffer the same punishment as was inflicted upon them

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ قَوْلِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى: {وَإِلَى ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمْ صَالِحًا}
chapter.eng-name: The Statement of Allah Taa'la: "And to Thamud (people, We sent) their brother Salih..."
